altTitles.ja: カラダ探し 解

description.es-la: Una misteriosa chica informa a Rumiko que pronto morirá. En ese momento, su tranquila vida cotidiana da otro horrible giro... La leyenda que circula en la escuela sobre la "chica de Rojo" se hace realidad y ella y sus amigos son atacados. Comienza así una nueva búsqueda del cuerpo, que debe completarse en solo siete días. Secuela de "Karada Sagashi".

altTitles.fr: Coma héroïque dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界おじさん

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！

description.en:
Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.es: No subestimes al personaje de apoyo

altTitles.ja: 傍観者、●●ちゃん

description.en:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

**Links:**

- [Alternative Raw (Lezhin)](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/ms_looking)

- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/miss-second-role)
description.fr: Elle se réveille un jour dans son roman préféré. Ce serait l'occasion de briller, sauf qu'on lui a donné un rôle de potiche absolue ! Aucun moyen d'approcher l'héroïne ni les 3 hommes qui lui tournent autour comme des mouches. Pas grave, elle arrivera coûte que coûte à exister ici !
description.id: Aku, bertemu dengan tiga pria ganteng seantero negeri. Putera mahkota, Bangsawan termuda sampai pemilik neraka sihir, Mereka semua mendambakan satu orang perempuan, Evelyn. Dia adalah temanku. Ketiga pria itu mendekati Evelyn dengan cara masing-masing. Lalu aku? Hanya menonton di pojokan saja. Bentar... Sepertinya aku pernah melihat eh maksudku membaca adegan ini.. Apa?! ruapanya aku berada di dalam dunia novel kesukaanku??!!
description.ja: 突然の目眩に襲われて目覚めると愛読していた小説の世界に引き込まれてしまった！？しかも女主人公をいじめる雑魚キャラ「ラテ・アクトリー」に転生…！！ どうせ人生唯一の楽しみである小説がリアルに堪能できれば満足と思いきや… 傍観者でいるつもりがだんだん目立ち始める「ラテ」 果たしてイケメンとの恋は成就するのか…！？
description.ko:
깨어나보니 내가 가장 좋아하는 소설 속에 들어와 버렸다!
그런데 주인공도 악역도 아닌… 눈물 나는 분량의 ‘들러리’라고?

현실에 치여사는 스물 다섯 학원 강사 김혜정! 그런데 즐겨 읽던 소설 <야수의 꽃> 세계로 떨어져 소설 속 인물 ‘라테 엑트리’가 된다.

…그런데 기왕 들어오게 해 준거 소설 속 미남들과 썸 좀 타는 주인공이 되게 해주지. 
여주인공을 괴롭히다 털릴 예정의 조연 라테 엑트리가 되어버리다니! 
에휴~ 그러면 그렇지 내 팔자야.

그래, 기왕 이렇게 된 거 열심히 구경이나 하자!
어차피 소설 보는 재미로 살아왔던 인생! 소설이 눈앞에서 실현된다는데 어찌 마다하겠는가! 
팝콘이나 먹으며 구경하지 뭐. 와작!

그런데 조연이었던 라테는 오히려 소설 속에서 자신의 존재감을 점점 내보이게 되는데…? 
소설 속의 들러리양의 파란만장한 구경기가 시작된다!
description.zh: 一睁开眼…竟然穿越到了我最近在追的小说里？可是为啥不按套路出牌，没有女主命的我竟然穿越到一个没有一丁点戏份的悲催小配角身上？事已至此我还是努力给自己加戏吧！抢在女主出场前跟三个男主来一场完美的邂逅，实现穿越人生的逆袭之路！

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

altTitles.ja: 追放する側の物語
追放する側の物語 仲間を追放したらパーティーが弱体化したけど、世界一を目指します。

altTitles.en: The Story Of The Banisher Side After Banishing The Party Member - The Party Was Weakened, But We Aim To Be The Best In The World

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Suru Gawa no Monogatari - Nakama wo Tsuihou Shitara Party ga Jakutaika Shitakedo, Sekaiichi wo Mezashimasu.

description.en:
"Exile" and you're weakened!? A "do-over" fantasy of a failed party!
"Stardust", an up-and-coming party, in order to aim even higher, expels Est, a “burden” of the party members.
But as a result, the party is weakened and Est is awakened!

In this "Serves You Right!" situation, a swordsman with zero motivation and zero pride rises to the occasion!
This is a story about the "Aftermath" of the "Side that Banished Him".

The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

altTitles.ja: ヘルシング

altTitles.en: Hellsing: The Legend of a Vampire Hunter
The Legend of a Vampire Hunter
The Legend of the Vampire Hunter

description.en:
Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing, an organization sponsored by the British government, to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army, Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard, an incredibly powerful vampire, has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family, he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self, she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing, the current leader, is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty, but lately, vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately, the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England, and perhaps the entire world, into war.  


---
description.es: La familia Van Helsing ha sido la némesis del conde Drácula y de toda la raza de vampiros.Ahora se ha convertido en toda una organización cuyo mejor cazador,un vampiro,usará el humor y la violencia para cumplir su destino...y ha dado origen a una exitosa serie de animación.
description.fr: En Angleterre, l'organisation secrète Hellsing agit pour protéger le pays des forces du mal, dont les vampires. Force de frappe de l'Église protestante, ce groupe dispose d'une arme secrète des plus inattendues: Alucard, vampire surpuissant et apparemment invulnérable. Mais leur mission se corsera quand ils devront faire face au Vatican et aux brigades anti-monstres de l'État le plus petit du monde...
description.hu: A Hellsing Királyi Protestáns Lovagrend az Angol Korona évszázados szervezete – egy család, amelynek a feladata a birodalom védelme a természetfeletti és istentelen veszedelmektől. A lovagrend lelke Sir Integra Wingates Hellsing, legfőbb fegyvere pedig Alucard, a szervezet szolgálatában álló titokzatos ősvámpír, valamint – újabban – Seras Victoria, egy balul elsült bevetésen született vámpírlány.
description.it: Londra, un'antica casata nobiliare combatte contro i vampiri da generazioni; si tratta dell'agenzia segreta HELLSING, comandata da Lady Integra Farbuke Wingates Hellsing.Integra, succeduta alla morte del padre, stipula un patto di sangue con il on il vampiro Alucard e lo induce a battersi contro le tremende forze occulte che minacciano il pianeta, dando vita a una delle saghe horror più famose nel panorama dei manga.
description.ja: 幽霊船デメテル号に乗ってアーカードが遂に来た！かくして役者は全員演壇へと登り、暁の惨劇は幕を上げる・・・・・・
description.lt:
Kažkur Anglijoje gyvuoja slapta organizacija, sukurta tam, kad apgintų karalienę ir šalį nuo įvairiausio plauko pabaisų. Sveiki atvykę į paslaptingąjį Hellsing – organizaciją, kuri žino, kaip spręsti problemas, kai iš tamsos išnyra vampyrai, gūlai ir kitokios šlykštynės. Be to, organizacijos nariai gali pasigirti puikiu ginklu.

Klausiate, kokiu? Ogi kitu vampyru, kuris šimtmečius tobulino savąjį kovos meną ir todėl yra bemaž neįveikiamas. Apsiginklavęs milžinišku pistoletu, užtaisytu ypatingomis sidabrinėmis kulkomis, Alukardas kelia siaubą ne tik nemirėliams. Tačiau ne tai svarbiausia. Skaitytoją visų pirma priblokš kandus šių istorijų sąmojis, neįtikėtinos iliustracijos ir beprotiškai kruvinas veiksmas. Nenuostabu, jog ši manga užkariavo visą pasaulį.
description.pt: Para resolver o caso de um estranho pastor de hábitos macabros, é chamada a Organização Hellsing, responsável por livrar a Inglaterra dos males que espreitam na noite. Alucard é a principal arma da Hellsing contra estes seres, e sua história se cruza com a da novata Seras Victoria e a da chefe da organização, Integra Wingates Hellsing.
description.ru: Вампир Алукард - древний и могущественный, вампир "в самом расцвете сил". Все что его интересует - это поиски по-настоящему сильного противника. Убивать и умирать - какие еще могут быть развлечения в бессмертной жизни? И организация "Хеллсинг", члены которой посвятили себя борьбе с порождениями тьмы вроде него. Что может их связывать кроме желания уничтожить друг друга? Но, как ни странно, Алукард и Хеллсинг прекрасно работают вместе… и будут работать ровно до тех пор, пока древний вампир не найдет для себя действительно могущественного и интересного врага.
description.tr:
Hortlaklar, vampirler, canavarlar... Kraliyet Protestan Şövalyeler Kardeşliği, yani Hellsing, onlarla kadim zamanlardan beri mücadele ediyor. Nasıl mı? Tabii ki yüksek teknoloji ürünü silahlar ve ekipmanla... Üstelik bunları kullanan kişi tam bir vampir uzmanı. Hellsing sizi aksiyon ve kan yüklü bir dünyaya davet ediyor.

Bu sayıda Hellsing Organizasyonu'nun avlarıyla ve düşmanlarıyla tanışıyoruz. Hiç beklenmeyen bazı gelişmeler, Integra Hellsing'in tüm planlarını bozuyor. Üstelik, kurumun yakın geçmişinde yaşanan güç oyunları ve entrikalar da karşımıza çıkıyor. Bakalım Hellsing bütün bu olanlarla başa çıkabildi mi ve olacaklarla başa çıkabilecek mi?
description.es-la: Llega uno de los mayores éxitos de los últimos años! Hellsing, una organización auspiciada por el gobierno británico, controlada por la implacable Integra, busca exterminar a los despiadados vampiros, cuya actividad va en aumento y causa pánico en la población. Su principal arma es Alucard, un sádico vampiro liberado por Integra después de años de reclusión. Junto a él, Victoria Seras, una chica policía ahora mitad vampiro. El peligro? Una posible guerra mundial. Mucho más explícito, violento, humorístico y adulto que la serie de TV.

altTitles.ja: 後藤さんは振り向かせたい

altTitles.en: Gotou-san Wants Me to Turn Around

altTitles.fr: Gotou-san veut que je me retourne

altTitles.es: Gotou-san Quiere Que me Dé la Vuelta.

description.en: Gotou-san, the prettiest girl in school, tries to get the attention of Maeda-kun, who sits in front of her. She secretly harbors a crush on him, but Maeda, who lacks self-confidence, doesn't notice her feelings. What is the future of Gotou-san's unwavering love?
description.es: La chica más guapa de la escuela, Gotou-san, siempre está tonteando con Maeda-kun, el chico sentado frente a ella. Ella está secretamente enamorada de él, pero Maeda-kun, que es inseguro de sí mismo, no entiende sus intenciones.
description.fr: Gotou-san, la plus jolie fille de l'école, demande quelque chose à Maeda-kun devant lui. Gotou-san l'aime secrètement, mais Maeda, qui ne lui fait pas confiance, ne la remarque pas.Quel est l'avenir de l'amour indéfectible de Gotou-san ?
description.id:
Gotou-san, gadis tercantik di sekolah, mencoba menarik perhatian Maeda-kun, yang duduk di depannya. Diam-diam Maeda memendam rasa suka padanya, tetapi Maeda, yang kurang percaya diri, tidak menyadari perasaannya. Bagaimana masa depan cinta Gotou-san yang tak tergoyahkan?

Di Web Indonesia lainnya itungan chapternya banyak karena pre-serialization.
Dan Terakhir Chapter 55 (5 Bulan yang lalu).
Chapter 34 ini adalah lanjutannya, dengan penomoran chapter menyesuaikan dengan rawnya.
description.ja:
その恋心に気付いてほしい！

学校一の美少女・後藤さんは前の席の前田くんになにかとちょっかいをかけてくる。そこには後藤さんの秘めたる恋心があるのだが、自分に自信のない前田君にはその意図は全く伝わらない。果たして後藤さんの一途な恋の行く末は？

description.en:
**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

title.en: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.ja: センパイ！わざとじゃないんです！

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.en: Senpai! I Didn't Do It on Purpose!

description.en:
Sachi, a high school student, is confessed to by her love Jun, a senior who is a year older than her, and they are finally going out! However, as soon as she realizes that she is in love with Jun, Sachi has a constitution that causes her to have accidental pervert incidents with him every chance she gets! When Sachi tries to hold his hand for the first time, she accidentally puts her hand down his pants and she ends up deeply misunderstanding Jun when he asks her to pull out her hand. 

It's a sexy cute☆romantic comedy!
description.ja: 女子高生・幸は一学年上の憧れの先輩・純に告白されて、晴れて付き合えることに！ ところが両思いになった途端、幸は純に対して事あるごとにラッキースケベを起こしてしまう体質になってしまい…！? はじめて手を握ろうとしたら、勢いあまって彼のズボンに手を突っ込んでしまい違うものを握ってしまったり、あまつさえ手を抜こうとしたら手で抜こうとしてしまったりする、そんな一組のカップルが織りなすエロカワ☆ラブコメディです。
description.ru: Старшеклассница Сати наконец начинает встречаться с Дзюном, парнем который старше её на год. Она первая призналась, а теперь каждый раз, когда её переполняют чувства любви, богатые формы так и норовят создать неловкую ситуацию! Первая попытка Сати взяться за руки, случайно превращается в нырок в штаны Дзюна, оставляя его в полном недоумении. Встречайте эро-кавай ☆ лавком мангу!

title.en: Wakeari Senpai no Kanojo ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 訳アリ先輩の彼女になりました

description.en:
"Ah, I want to die."   
  
Sagami, who works part time at a convenience store, is a target of bullying - one of the reasons is her grades being not the best. Meanwhile, Onizuka, an ex-studious turned delinquent, gets tangled with her. With their fates now intertwined, how will they grow out of their pasts?

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Deep Sea Cyber-Paradise, SE.RA.PH

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　深海電脳楽土 SE.RA.PH

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Shinkai Dennou Rakudo, SE.RA.PH

altTitles.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Abyssal Cyber Paradise, SE.RA.PH

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ: Эпос о Наследии. SE.RA.PH. Электронный рай в морской глубине

altTitles.uk: Доля/Великий Наказ: Епос Залишків - Глибоководний кібер-рай SE.RA.PH

description.en: To repair the singularity of the future, the main character, Ritsuka Fujimaru, will shift again to lay down a tremendous battle.
description.pt-br: Ao lidar com a incineração da ordem humana, Fujimaru Ritsuka se depara com uma nova e incompreensiva ameaça. Tudo começa quando um navio petroleiro denominado Seraphix desaparece sem deixar rastros.

altTitles.ja: 獅子王スバルにからまれる!!
虚の記憶
虚（から）の記憶

description.en:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.  
  
Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.  
  
With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.
___
**Note:** This manga is based on the song of the same name.

title.en: I Hold the Heart of a Tyrant

description.en:
The Crown Prince’s only friend, me, Euseniel Heartland.

One day, our family was expelled from the capital for having had a bad influence on the Crown Prince. But after 14 years, we finally reunite, However,  he has changed drastically.

When asked why he changed, the Crown Prince answers that it is because he wanted to be the ideal man for me. But no, this is not the friend I used to know anymore, And it's not only his appearance what has changed, I'm sure there something else on the inside that's not the same as before. What could it be?

altTitles.ja: コハエース＋
コハエースプラス

description.en: One year after the previous Koha-Ace, they're back at it again! The curtain draws on another disrespectful battle royale that TYPE-MOON somehow manages to tolerate! (Sequel to Koha-Ace)

altTitles.ja: ＭＡＩＤｅｓ─メイデス─メイド、地獄の戦場に転送される。固有のゴミ収集魔法で、最弱クラスのまま人類最強に。@COMIC

description.en:
"……W-what should I do? I’m being transported to the battlefield of hell!"

In the midst of the war against the demonic beasts, where humanity faces the threat of extinction, the maid girl Orsela accidentally finds herself transferred to a forest on the front lines of the battlefield. She has no weapons or combat experience; all she possesses is her seemingly useless inherent magic, which can only summon things that people no longer need.

When she encounters a large magical beast—a dragon—and finds herself in a desperate, life-threatening situation, she gambles everything and summons a magical weapon: a revolver, and a battle-crazed girl of heroic class!?

The magic that was thought to be useless turns out to be more suited for battle than any other magic...

Before she knows it, she becomes the last bastion protecting humanity!

The weakest class maid carves out a future for mankind!
A survival fantasy of rising to the top in a world on the brink of collapse begins!

altTitles.ja: BLEACH カラー版
ブリーチ
ブリーチ カラー版

description.en:
Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society. While fighting a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans who display psychic energy, Rukia attempts to lend Ichigo some of her powers so that he can save his family, but much to her surprise, Ichigo absorbs every last drop of her energy. Now a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself, Ichigo quickly learns that the world he inhabits is one full of dangerous spirits, and along with Rukia, who is slowly regaining her powers, it's Ichigo's job to both protect the innocent from Hollows and to help the spirits themselves find peace.   
  
Monochrome version won the 50th Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
description.es:
Ichigo Kurosaki siempre ha sido capaz de ver fantasmas, pero esta habilidad no cambia su vida tanto como su encuentro cercano con Rukia Kuchiki, una Segadora de Almas y miembro de la misteriosa Sociedad de las Almas. Mientras lucha contra un hueco, un espíritu maligno que se aprovecha de los humanos que muestran energía psíquica, Rukia intenta prestarle a Ichigo algunos de sus poderes para que pueda salvar a su familia, pero para su sorpresa, Ichigo absorbe hasta la última gota de su energía. Ahora que ya es un auténtico Segador de Almas, Ichigo aprende rápidamente que el mundo que habita está lleno de peligrosos espíritus y, junto con Rukia, que está recuperando lentamente sus poderes, el trabajo de Ichigo consiste en proteger a los inocentes de los huecos y ayudar a los propios espíritus a encontrar la paz.  
  
Versión monocroma ganó el 50º Premio Shogakukan Manga en la categoría Shounen.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do mangá Bleach. A história gira em torno de Kurosaki Ichigo um estudante de 15 anos que tem uma estranha capacidade de ver, tocar e falar com espíritos de pessoas mortas. Logo que o Shinigami (Deus da Morte) Kuchiki Rukia toma conhecimento dos poderes dele ela decide investigá-lo, e acaba em uma luta com um Hollow que foi atraído pelo forte poder espiritual de Ichigo, antes de ser derrotada pela criatura, Rukia passa seus poderes a Ichigo, o qual se torna um Shinigami, e após derrotar o Hollow ingressa em uma jornada para proteger os humanos e os espíritos da ameaça dos Hollows.

altTitles.ja: マジガワ！～魔法少女のきぐるみ～

description.en: Sakura Menon transformed into a magical girl with the power of a disguise. Shiki was suddenly kidnapped by a mysterious monster, and to save her, she decided to fight using the magic girl power!
description.es-la: Sakura Menon se transformó en una chica mágica con el poder de un disfraz. Shiki fue secuestrada repentinamente por un misterioso monstruo. ¡Y para salvarla, decidió luchar usando el poder de chica mágica!

altTitles.ja: シブヤニアファミリー

description.en: A small series that frankly depicts the circumstances of a third-grade girl living in Shibuya and her family.
description.ja:
渋谷に住む小３女子とその家族の事情を赤裸々に描く小型連載。
最後に書いてある「しぶや係日誌」も見てね。

altTitles.ja: 魂の変則

description.en: Yuichi Shiro is a foolish, narcissistic, and oblivious teenage boy. After a sudden incident his once ordinary life goes through great changes. How will the optimistic self proclaimed genius handle the life he will lead from now on? As well as handle the new acquaintances and enemies it brings with it. Let the story of action, life, romance and stupidity begin. (Original Web [Novel](https://www.fictionpress.com/s/3068594/1/Soul-Anomaly)).

title.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)

altTitles.ja: 銀河英雄伝説

description.en:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
description.ru:
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi-san, Saikyou no Dungeon wo Tsukurimasen ka?

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師さん、最強のダンジョンを創りませんか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi-san, Saikyou no Danjon o Tsukurimasen ka?

altTitles.en: Do you want to create the strongest dungeon, Mr. Alchemist who was expelled?
Exiled Alchemist, Why Not Create the Strongest Dungeon?

description.en: Rick, an alchemist who was banished from the strongest heroes' party, is wandering the wilds alone, when he saves a beautiful woman. It turns out that she is a dungeon spirit! Rick makes a contract with her and becomes the dungeon master. Now he is determined to create a dungeon that will defeat all the heroes!

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.en: I’m a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped Into a Gyaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en: Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.It's the beginning of an introverted high school guy => gender-swapped gyaru comedy!---- [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja:
陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。
母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！
ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
陰キャ男子高校生⇒ギャルTSコメディ開幕！！
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.ja: 師匠、あと49回死んでください

description.en:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”

altTitles.ja: レオと三日月
チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

altTitles.ja: ときめきトゥナイト

description.en:
Ranze Etou is an adorable immortal girl with a vampire father and a werewolf mother who would throw things at each other when they get into childish fights. Ranze, however, just wants to live like a normal girl and lead a normal life. Unfortunately, she is "blessed" with the power to turn into anything she bites. For example, if she accidentally bites a cake the wrong way, then she will turn into a cake. The only way to return to normal is to sneeze! Ranze is in love with Shun Makabe, who is a handsome human boy at school. However, a human girl (without much hair) named Youko also likes Shun, and she will do anything to reveal that Ranze is not a human!! Things get even more complicated when Ranze meets Aaron, who is the prince of the Spirit World. Aaron falls in love with Ranze and first sight, and he will do whatever it takes to win her away from Shun… Tokimeki Tonight was one of the hottest mangas in Japan, and you sure don't want to miss this hilarious comedy!  
  
NOTE: This manga does NOT have defined chapters - each volume is about 150 pages of continuous artwork and story. The volumes were split into chapters by the groups for convenience.

altTitles.ja: 笑顔のたえない職場です

altTitles.en: A Workplace Where You Can't Help But Smile

description.en: New shoujo manga artist Nana Futami works hard every day while being supported by Kaede Satou, her female editor who is older than her, and Mizuki Hazama, her assistant. According to the girl herself, she sometimes drums up intense daydream delusions of occupational illness! A working girls comedy set in the entertainment industry, brought to you by an author who always draws various girls.
description.ko: 신인 작가 후타미는 본인이 말하길 망상은 직업병! 이라며 담당 사토 씨와 어시스턴트 하 씨에게 도움을 받으면서 오늘도 열심히 일한다! 만화계에서 일하는 어른의 청춘군상극. 대상 독자는 만화를 사랑하는 모든 사람 입니다.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui

altTitles.ja: 僕らのアイは気持ち悪い

altTitles.ja-ro: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui

description.en:
Everyone is hiding a "secret."

Azuki Komugi is obsessed with ruminating on her memories of her high school girlfriend "Meguru," and creating a body model of hers out of clay.

One day, Azuki drops her homemade "Meguru" at the 100-yen shop where she works part-time, and sneaks into her workplace on her off-shift to get "her" back. However, what she sees there is a fellow co-worker, high school girl Yoyuki Remu, who is about to express her lust for "Meguru" in a way that is different from Azuki's...

altTitles.ja: 榎本先輩は天使なんかじゃない

altTitles.vi: Enomoto-senpai không phải là một thiên thần

description.en: In the room of Hagino (university student), there is a ghost (?) of a man who was supposed to have died in an accident. That is Enomoto. Enomoto is the best friend of a senior student whom Hagino has a crush on, and is a bold man with a mean look in his eyes. Like the Grim Reaper, Enomoto declares, "If I can take my best friend's life within 49 days, I can come back to life in his place." A BL story of secret nemeses between an egocentric freeloader and a doggy-like landlord!

altTitles.es: Rurouni Kenshin: Una historia romántica de un espadachín de la era Meiji

altTitles.en: Kenshin the Wanderer: Meiji Swordsman Romance

altTitles.ja: るろうに剣心―明治剣客浪漫譚―

description.en:
140 years ago in Kyoto, with the coming of the American "Black Ships," there arose a warrior who, felling men with his bloodstained blade, gained the name Hitokiri, man slayer! His killer blade helped close the turbulent Bakumatsu era and slashed open the progressive age known as Meiji . Then he vanished, and with the flow of years, became legend.  
  
Ten years later, a young woman's life is saved when she happens upon a strange wandering swordsman named Kenshin. The young woman accepts the wanderer into her dojo, despite his secretive past, and the two become fast friends. As their relationship grows, they meet and make more friends (as well as enemies), and they grow accustomed to their life together.  
  
However, one man can only run from his past for so long, and it isn't long before Kenshin is forced to face the life he thought he'd left behind. Now, together with his friends, he must fight the ghosts of his past if he wants the people he loves to have any kind of future.  
  
Contains a side story called Yahiko no Sakabato.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Samurai X** (2001)

altTitles.ja: 履いてください、鷹峰さん

description.en:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
description.ja: 生徒会長の鷹峰さんはスクールカーストのトップ中のトップ、神！　対して、友達も存在感も皆無の白田くんはある日、鷹峰さんの生おっぱいを見てしまう。そこから変わるスクールライフ。――「私にパンツを履かせなさい」なんと鷹峰さんは”未だ穢れ知らぬ乙女（エターナル・バージンロード）”という能力でパンツを脱いで時をかける少女だった。ノーパンではいられない鷹峰さんのクローゼットとして白田くんは鷹峰さんにモモ色おねだりをされ続けるハメに…。
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuichi_hiiragi)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2056601)  
- [Official Page (JP)](https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/joker/series/takamine/)
description.pt-br:
A presidente do conselho estudantil, Takamine-san, está no topo da hierarquia escolar, uma deusa! Um dia, Shirota-kun acidentalmente vê os seios nus de Takamine-san. A partir de então, sua vida escolar mudou, sendo chantageado para uma vida de servidão a Takamine-san. ― “Coloque minha calcinha para mim”
Shirota-kun acabou em uma situação difícil devido aos favores cor-de-rosa de Takamine-san.

altTitles.ja: メダリスト

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

title.en: Kabeyaku Nado Fuyou to Tsuihousareta S-kyuu Boukensha, <Dorei Kaihou> Skill wo Kushi shite Shijou Saikyou no Kunizukuri

altTitles.ja: 壁役など不要と追放されたＳ級冒険者、≪奴隷解放≫スキルを駆使して史上最強の国造り

altTitles.en: An S-class Adventurer, Banished as the Tank of the Party, Uses His "Slave Release" Skill To Build the Strongest Country in History!

altTitles.pt-br: Um aventureiro classe-S que foi banido como tank da party, usa suas habilidades de “Libertação dos Escrav*s” para construir a nação mais forte da história.

description.en:
Alex, a holy knight, is suddenly expelled from his adventurers' party.

He tries to live a comfortable life by accepting a quest to cultivate a remote area, but suddenly he is given the extra skill "Slave Release"...?

Summon beautiful girl slaves and cultivate a demon territory overrun with demons! A slow life of harem in a fantasy world is about to begin!
description.ja:
冒険者パーティーから突如追放された聖騎士・アレックス。

僻地の開拓クエストを受けて、悠々自適の生活を送ろうとするが突然エクストラスキル≪奴隷解放≫を授かって―!?

美少女奴隷を召喚して、魔物が跋扈する魔族領を開拓しろ! 異世界ハーレムスローライフ開幕!

altTitles.en: My Cat Is Waiting For Me!
My Kitten♂ Is Waiting, So I'm Going Home.

altTitles.ja: 子猫♂が待ってるので帰ります。

description.en:
Miyako is stressed out at work. Seeking solace, she tries to get a cat, but is unable to do so. She returns home dejected… only to find a child with cat ears and a hoodie lying on the floor…! When she rushes to take care of him, she finds out that he is a very beautiful boy!

The cute and dangerous life together of a beautiful boy and an office worker begins!

altTitles.en: Possibly the Greatest Alchemist of All Time

altTitles.ja: いずれ最強の錬金術師?

altTitles.en: Someday Will I Be the Greatest Alchemist?

description.en:
Not even a hero, Takumi Iruma gets accidentally mixed in with a group of heroes chosen to be summoned to another world. As compensation for the mix-up, a goddess offers him the right to choose any skill he wishes for! Hoping for a peaceful and quiet life that has nothing to do with fighting or going into battle, he chooses a seemingly boring creation skill. However, it turns out "alchemy" is the most powerful skill that allows him to create everything from a holy sword to flying ships! This cheat skill he unexpectedly acquired turns him into a wealthy merchant and makes him undefeatable in battles! A heartwarming adventure story about (possibly) the most powerful alchemist in another world!

*Alpha Manga*

---

*Alternate description:*

Iruma Takumi, a 40-year old salary man, was dragged into a hero summoning just like in a template. What was his fate? The Goddess sent him and the heroes to the other world separately.  
  
With the Goddess’ overprotective support, he landed in a different world looking handsome, rejuvenated, and quite different from a Japanese.  
  
Although he wanted a slow life while working in the manufacturing trade, that was not permitted by the Goddess’ special body and abilities.  
  
Would Takumi be able to live a peaceful life in a different world?

title.en: Genshin Impact - Don't let the food go cold, Paimon!

altTitles.ja: 原神 - パイモンとグルメは冷めないうちに！

altTitles.es-la: Genshin Impact - ¡No dejes que la comida se enfríe, Paimon!

title.ja: Boku wa Isekai de Fuyo Mahou to Shoukan Mahou wo Tenbin ni Kakeru

altTitles.ja: ぼくは異世界で付与魔法と召喚魔法を天秤にかける

altTitles.en: Another World Survival: Min-maxing my Support and Summoning Magic

altTitles.id: Menyeimbangkan Sihir Pendukungku dan Sihir Pemanggilan Di Dunia lain

altTitles.en: Balancing My Support Magic and Summoning Magic In A Different World

description.en:
Ostracized and tormented by his peers to the point of breaking, Kazuhisa Kaya set off into the nearby forest atop the mountain with one purpose: to dig a pitfall and bring about the death of the person behind his suffering. However, right when Kazuhisa was about to succeed in his revenge, a sudden earthquake throws his plans out of whack! Caught unaware, all he can do is patiently lie in wait until someone lumbering across the path happens to fall into his trap. Kazuhisa’s excitement is short-lived, however, as the corpse at the bottom of his pitfall turns out not to be the bully he was expecting but a grotesque, pig-looking monster, and his confusion only grows as he’s suddenly greeted by a pure-white room and a RPG-like status screen.

Strange monsters now wandering the mountain and with newfound powers at his disposal, Kazuhisa is forced to throw all concerns over his tormentor to the wayside as he focuses on a new goal: survival. That’s not going to be as easy as it seems, however, as he’s not the only one to have been wrapped up in this mess…

(Hanashi Media)

[Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/another-world-survival/)
description.id: suatu hari. di sekolah swasta tertentu dengan asrama, seluruh sekolah dipindahkan ke dunia lain. aku, Kaya Kazuhisa. dari kelas 1 SMA. telah diintimidasi untuk waktu yang lama. untuk membunuh pelakunya yang telah menggangguku, aku menggali jebakan. tapi tiba-tiba aku membunuh monster. sejak saat itu. aku telah berevolusi menjadi keberadaan langka yang dapat melawan monster. di hari yang sama, aku menyelamatkan seorang gadis dari kelas 3 sekolah menengah, Shimozono Arisu di hutan dari orc. ketika aku bekerja dengan arisu untuk mengalahkan orc, dan secara bertahap naik aku level. aku dipaksa untuk membuat pilihan. haruskah aku memilih sihir pemanggilan yang cocok untuk bertahan hidup sendirian? atau aku harus pilih sihir pendukung yang digunakan saat bertarung bersama dengannya?
description.ja:
高等部1年生でいじめられっ子の賀谷和久（かや・かずひさ）は森の中、いじめの主犯格を殺すための落とし穴を掘っていた。だが数分後、その穴に落とし殺害することができたのは──!?　RPGのような異世界の山中へとまるごと転移した全寮制の学園のなか、スキルという名の“ちから”を得た和久。彼は自分ひとり生き抜くために最適な【召喚魔法】か、それとも少女たちを戦わせるための【付与魔法】か……天秤にかける。

獰猛なモンスターたちによる凌辱の危機が迫るなか、主人公と少女たちは果たして生き残れるのか……!?

altTitles.ja: 苺ましまろ

description.en: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.
The fun and marvelous daily life of a young couple after meeting mysterious children who found their way to them.
description.ko:
숲속의 젊은 부부와 어느 날 그들에게 찾아온
정체불명의 아이들이 만들어가는 즐겁고 신묘한 일상
description.zh:
渴望拥有孩子的年轻夫妇，
突降长着老虎耳朵的萌娃！
很久以前在一座村庄里，从小青梅竹马的他们长大后顺理成章结为了夫妇。但结婚多年却一直没有孩子，尝试了各种“良药”后无果，最终找到了隔壁村传闻很厉害的神算子告诉他们需要搬家到山林里。某天突然家里出来了两个来历不明的小孩！好像还长着老虎的耳朵和尾巴？！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/HEALING/laohulaile/list?title_no=1852)

---

- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/103632508)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=279309005)

altTitles.en: Legend of Luo Xiaohei: Lanxi Town
Luo Xiaohei Zhan Ji: Lanxi Zhen

description.en: Lanxi Zhen tells the story of Laojun, Xuanli, and Qingning during the war. It shows a different world of demons and gods.
description.zh: 《罗小黑战记》君清篇~~讲述战争年代的老君、玄离和清凝的故事。为你展现不一样的妖神世界~

altTitles.ja: さざなみ町と、はざまの子

altTitles.en: Sazanami Town and the Hazama Girl

description.en: A young woman visits a seaside town. Even though it's her first time there, everything seems strangely nostalgic. Somehow she ends up working at an empty little shop serving the local customers. But what will she discover in this strange town that carries the scent of the sea ?

altTitles.ja: ホテル・インヒューマンズ

description.en:
The most exquisite hotels in the world have certain standards: the finest food, the most sublime comfort, captivating entertainment, the latest weapons, reliable identity fabrication, and untraceable corpse disposal.

The name of this place where the people who have "forgotten their humanity" visit is "Hotel In Humans." The hitmen guests are welcomed by the concierges who never say "no."
description.pt-br: Os hotéis mais requintados do mundo têm certos padrões: As melhores comidas, o conforto mais sublime, entretenimento cativante, e, além disso, as armas mais recentes, fabricação confiável de identidade e descarte de cadáveres não rastreável. O nome desse lugar onde as pessoas que o visitam "esqueceram sua humanidade", chama-se "Hotel In Humans" (Hotel Desumano)

title.en: Italiajin no Onnanoko ga Isourou Suru Koto ni Natta (Pre-Serialization)

altTitles.ja: Italiajin no Onnanoko ga Isourou Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.es: La chica italiana se ha convertido en una arrimada

altTitles.ja: イタリア人の女の子が居候することになった

altTitles.ru: Эта итальянская девушка стала такой халявщицей

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng người Ý và cuộc sống tự do

altTitles.en: This Italian Girl Has Become Such a Freeloader

description.en:
Yuji is an artist working out of a modest Tokyo apartment, when he suddenly receives a letter from his mother informing—not asking—him about an Italian girl coming to live with him while she attends university. Supposedly the two have a history, but forgotten memories lend little in the way of preparing either party for the inevitable awkwardness to come. Left with little say in the matter, Yuji’s bachelorhood comes to an end, and his life with Francesca begins.

Full color till Chapter 26.
description.ja: 異国から来た女の子は天然? 大胆? イラストレーターの雄二の前に突然現れたのはイタリア人の女の子フランチェスカ。母からの言いつけでいきなり一緒に暮らすことに! 二人で一緒にご飯を食べたり、部屋着姿にドキドキしたり……。 とまどいながら始まった同居生活だけど、ちょっとずつ二人の距離は近づいていき……!?
description.vi: Sẽ ra sao nếu một cô gái từ đất nước xa lạ đến ở nhà tôi? Đột nhiên chúng tôi phải sống chung với nhau theo ý của mẹ. Sống cùng nhau thì khác biệt rõ còn xa, nhưng khoảng cách giữa chúng tôi thì càng gần...!?
description.pt-br: Um cara que passa a morar junto com a amiga de infância Italiana na qual não se recorda de conhecer
